org.tiralab.particles

Interface Model

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Fluid, Stars

    public interface Model
    The classes, which implement Model interface, store the actual particles. These classes will only have simple array like structure for storing the particle. The acceleration structures have more specialised getters for fetching particles at some specific region. The interface allows Models to emit event about particle changes to its acceleration structure.

    • Method Detail

      • reset

        void reset(long particleCount)
        Reset the model.
        Parameters:
        particleCount - Number of the particles created.

      • reset

        void reset()
        Reset the model with old parameters.

      • getParticles

        Particle[] getParticles()
        Get all particles from model in array.
        Returns:
        Gives every particle in the model.

      • setStorage

        void setStorage(Storage storage)
        Set the storage. The model sends particle change events to storage.
        Parameters:
        storage - The new storage object for the model

      • simulate

        void simulate()
        Simulate single iteration of the simulation.
